text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE
DIVISION OF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION
BOX S45Q, UNIVERSITY STATION
KNOXVILLE
RADIO AND TELEVISION SERVICES
RADIO STATION WUOT
April 7, 1955
Mr. Prank Schooley
WILL
Univ. of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Prank:
The report of the Network Acceptance subcommittee
is brief, to the point, and is a simple matter of
figures®
Since our appointment in November, we have had
2lf offerings for evaluation® As of April 2, we had
acted on 19 of these, giving 17 approvals and two
rejections. We still have five on which to take
action®
Though the total actions of the subcommittee
have been nearly unanimous, it should be noted that
unanimity in voting for approval or rejection has
not been nearly so prevalent® There have been many
two-to-one votes, for or against.
Unfortunately, I doubt that I will be at
Columbus. To latch onto the phrase of one ofthe
more revered members, ’’we're pore folks down here,"
and it looks as if our budget has expired.
Sincerely yours.
,/acTk Westbrook (WUOT)
Chairman
Network Acceptance
CC: Waldo Abbot
Subcommittee
